scripts.lint: pnpm exec nx run common:lint && pnpm exec nx run core:lint
scripts.smoke:apk-runtime: pnpm exec nx run core:build --output-style=static && node tools/scripts/smoke-apk-runtime.cjs
scripts.poll:houdoku: pnpm exec nx run core:build --output-style=static && node tools/scripts/poll-apk-runtime.cjs --interval-ms=300000
scripts.houdoku:update: pnpm exec nx run core:build --output-style=static && node tools/scripts/houdoku-update-once.cjs
scripts.houdoku:cleanup:unsupported: pnpm exec nx run core:build --output-style=static && node tools/scripts/cleanup-unsupported-apks.cjs
scripts.smoke:tiyo: pnpm exec nx run core:build --output-style=static && node tools/scripts/smoke-apk-runtime.cjs --apk-dir="C:/Users/dnvm8/AppData/Roaming/Houdoku/Keiyoushi APK Extensions" --source-key=mangadex
scripts.smoke:tiyo:all: pnpm exec nx run core:build --output-style=static && node tools/scripts/smoke-apk-runtime.cjs --apk-dir="C:/Users/dnvm8/AppData/Roaming/Houdoku/Keiyoushi APK Extensions" --all-sources
scripts.release:core: pnpm exec nx run common:lint && pnpm exec nx run core:lint && pnpm exec nx run core:build
